TITLE: Episode 147 - Body Shaming (or, Destroying a Cult) with Syran Warner
DESCRIPTION: Syran Warner is on a mission to destroy a cult called "The Body." This cult views children as property, steals children, and destroys the lives of its members and those who get out. A journalist and alternative media producer, Syran is doing anything he can to take this cult down. Let's talk about it.
